subject: Display Boards on works on National Highways.
text: #Rrf4 vr4 <TJTAT wfedrut THN /Phone: 91+11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-1+-25093507 25093514 (7 Yart, TVF 9ar- 37 TvUTf HAT4} Q {Extn.: 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 & 6, #R-10, TTHT, 7 07-110 075 G-5 & 6. Sector-10. Dwarka, New Delhi- 110075 No. 11041/21/2002-Admn. e Dec 2005 POLICY MATTER TECHNICAL (59/20052 Subject Display Boards on works on National Highways. Guidelines for display boards on all ongoing projects on National Highways, are contained in (he MoSRT&H: letter No: RWINH-33044/10/2002/ S&R(R) dated 12 02 (copy enclosed): 2. It has however been observed that display boards are not being provided at each work site As the dissemination of information about development projects is an important activity to keep the public informed, it is requested that the guidelines about the display boards on all National Highway works should be followed   strictly and all field officers instructed to comply with these requirerents invariably by providing display boards at each location of ongoing National Highway projects. 3. This may be brought to notice of all concerned for strict compliance (GP Chand General Manager (Adm) To 1_ AIl Officers of NHAI 2 AII PIUs/CMUsISPVs #4 NIA Aug
